summary: Frontend testing completed for Resume Tailor feature. All requested features are working correctly.
test_credentials: localStorage.setItem('growshell_auth', JSON.stringify({isAuthenticated: true, user: {name: 'John Doe', email: 'john@example.com'}, onboardingComplete: true}))
seed_data_creation: None - all data is mocked in frontend
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Resume Tailor features are working. Auth state persists via localStorage. Protected routes redirect to signin when not authenticated. The Resume Tailor button on Jobs page navigates to /resume-tailor with job state passed via React Router.
tests_passed: Resume Tailor button click on Jobs page navigates to /resume-tailor
ResumeTailorPage displays job details in left sidebar (title, company, location, salary, work mode)
ResumeTailorPage shows match analysis with score ring (7.8 Good)
ResumeTailorPage shows keyword matching - matched keywords (React, TypeScript, Node.js, REST APIs, Git, Agile, CI/CD, AWS)
ResumeTailorPage shows keyword matching - missing keywords (GraphQL, Microservices, Docker, Kubernetes)
ResumeTailorPage shows suggested improvements with priority levels (HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW)
Back navigation from ResumeTailorPage works (returns to /jobs)
Auth state persists across page reloads (localStorage)
Protected routes redirect to signin when not authenticated
mocked_data_note: ALL DATA IS MOCKED - No backend API calls. Job data is static in JobsPage.jsx, auth functions are mocked in AppContext.js
